text: Igoris Kirilovas (, Igor Yevgenyevich Kirilov; born 19 August 1971 in Vilnius) is a former Lithuanian football player of Russian ethnic origin. ==Honours== ;Lithuania *Baltic Cup winner: 1991, 1998 ==External links== * ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Footballers from Vilnius Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Lithuanian footballers Category:Lithuania international footballers Category:FK Panerys Vilnius players Category:1. title: Igoris Kirilovas
